items.instruction: Set up user in Active Directory

description.content: [Soilandrock.local --> My Business ---> Users --> SBSUsers --> Auckland/CHCH --> Office365].

items.instruction: The user logonname should be firstname.lastname

description.content:
Assign Business Premium/Exchange Online (Plan1) license.  
Add license for O365 Advanced Threat Protection (Plan 1). 

 NOTE:  Business Standard replaced Business Premium.  To purchase in CSP license MS365 Business Standard with Exhange Online Advanced Threat Protection, and then in Office 365 portal to assign license to the user.

items.instruction: Setup VPN for Laptop Users:  Add to restricted VPN group
Ensure the default primary email address is in the correct format

description.content:
example: firstname.lastname@soilandrock.co.nz 

(not @soilandrock.onmicrosoft.com) - to correct this you will need follow the steps below (Proceed with caution - escalate if necessary)

Go to ADSIedit, browse to OU where user resides, go to properties, go to attribute proxyAddress and add attribute SMTP:firstname.lastname@soilandrock.co.nz & smtp:firstname@soilandrock.co.nz, initiate directory sync again to apply change.

items.instruction: Add User to the distribution group: ALL AKL

description.content:
AUCKLAND Users ONLY - add new staff members to the Meeting rooms: Puketoka and Rangitoto

(From Office365, Open puketoka@soilandrock.co.nz as "Open as a new mailbox" and then Share calendar)

Go to Companies, Type the company name and select Contacts. 
Click the + sign to add the new contact.
(who would then create Deltek account for the new user). Provide the username in format: soilandrock\username

items.instruction: Test send/receiveing emails and  ENFORCE 2FA for the user.
